profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2010-09-23T12:49-0700

repository.corpname: Stanford University. Department of Special Collections and University Archives

physdesc.extent: (113 cartons, 5 flat boxes, 9 special containers) still in process

did.langmaterial: Materials primarily in English, though large amounts of materials are partially or wholly in Spanish.
did.abstract: Production materials from Lourdes Portillo's documentary film¯making career from 1979¯2001. Includes both pre¯ and post¯production paper records as well as moving image and audio materials from her productions.

origination.label: creator
origination.corpname: Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences.

processinfo.head: Processing note
processinfo.p: The collection was processed by Crystal Rangel, a post¯graduate fellow from the NYU Moving Image Archiving and Preservation Graduate Program under a grant from the Institute of Museum and Library Sciences.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: All requests to reproduce, publish, quote from, or otherwise use collection materials must be submitted in writing to the Head of Special Collections and University Archives, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, California 94304¯6064. Consent is given on behalf of Special Collections as the owner of the physical items and is not intended to include or imply permission from the copyright owner. Such permission must be obtained from the copyright owner, heir(s) or assigns. See: http://library.stanford.edu/depts/spc/pubserv/permissions.html.
Restrictions also apply to digital representations of the original materials. Use of digital files is restricted to research and educational purposes.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [identification of item], Lourdes Portillo Papers, M1480 Dept. of Special Collections, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, Calif.
